mapper.sql: contract_id, name, owner, owner_address, owner_name, description, reg_time, status, create_tx, block_num,code
mapper.select:
select
from bl_contract_info where 1=1
and owner_address = #{ownerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by reg_time DESC
mapper.insert: insert into bl_contract_info (contract_id, name, owner, owner_address, owner_name, description, reg_time, status, create_tx, block_num, code) values (#{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blockNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{code,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update bl_contract_info
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
owner = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
owner_address = #{ownerAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
owner_name = #{ownerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reg_time = #{regTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_tx = #{createTx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
block_num = #{blockNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
code = #{code,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
